text: Groww is one of the smoothest and easiest apps for beginners in trading and investing. The interface is clean, buying and selling stocks is simple, and GTT orders make it beginner-friendly. However, the app still needs a few advanced features like stop-loss / take-profit for delivery trades and trailing stop-loss options for swing traders.
